name: Street Racing (itch) (Vulture Limited)
description:
This is a 3d Racing Game

Race Types:

Just Driving:

Take your car out for a spin on the open road. There's nobody else around so you're just driving for fun.

Practice Lap:

The race track is empty so why not get a few practice laps in before you enter the race.

Pure Racing:

It's time for a madcap race with two hundred drivers! Starting from the back of the pack have you got what it takes to get to first place in only three laps.

Total Endurance:

Set off on a journey across the country avoiding regular traffic and getting to each checkpoint before your timer runs out. How far can you make it?

Keyboard Controls:

Use the arrows or WASD cluster to control your car. Tap the space bar to change your viewing angle.
